task_desc: Given a series of navigation instructions, determine whether one would end up back at the starting point

1.input:
Always face forward. Take 1 step backward. Take 2 steps left. Take 6 steps forward. Take 6 steps left. Take 7 steps left. Take 9 steps forward.
Choices:
A. True
B. False

2.input:
Take 9 steps. Turn right. Turn right. Take 9 steps.
Choices:
A. True
B. False

3.input:
Turn around. Take 8 steps. Take 10 steps. Turn left. Turn left. Take 9 steps. Take 3 steps. Take 1 step. Take 5 steps.
Choices:
A. True
B. False

4.input:
Take 3 steps. Take 5 steps. Turn around. Take 6 steps. Take 2 steps.
Choices:
A. True
B. False

5.input:
Turn around. Take 7 steps. Turn around. Turn right. Turn right. Take 2 steps.
Choices:
A. True
B. False

6.input:
Take 9 steps. Turn left. Turn around. Turn right. Take 9 steps. Turn left.
Choices:
A. True
B. False

7.input:
Always face forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 2 steps backward. Take 1 step backward. Take 5 steps right.
Choices:
A. True
B. False

8.input:
Always face forward. Take 7 steps right. Take 7 steps left.
Choices:
A. True
B. False

9.input:
Always face forward. Take 10 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 7 steps forward. Take 2 steps forward.
Choices:
A. True
B. False

10.input:
Always face forward. Take 5 steps left. Take 5 steps backward. Take 5 steps right. Take 5 steps forward. Take 7 steps backward. Take 6 steps forward. Take 1 step forward.
Choices:
A. True
B. False
